Texts.Chs: 不要让财富的诱惑左右你 - 尽管他们收藏的宝物和手工艺品肯定具有潜在的价值，但是他们的堕落和残忍也是如此。
Texts.Eng: Do not allow the promise of wealth sway you - while their collection of treasures and artifacts is surely potentially valuable, so too is their depravity and cruelty.

Texts.Chs: 掠夺者不关心别人的幸福，甚至他们自己的幸福 - 他们所渴望的只是强迫自己的同类“进步”。如果你试图取缔他们的一个操作基地，那就得准备好遭遇各种令人作呕的实验。
Texts.Eng: Ravagers care nothing for the well-being of others, or really even of themselves - all they desire is the forcible 'improvement' of their kind. Should you attempt to take out one of their bases of operation, be prepared to encounter a variety of sickening experiments.

Texts.Chs: 掠夺者必须极其谨慎地对待。你可能不会遇到他们，除非你在星系中的小行星带中寻找他们，但是偶尔他们会袭击定居点...为了猎物。
Texts.Eng: Ravagers must be treated with extreme caution. You probably won't encounter them unless you seek them out in the asteroid fields dotting the galaxy, but occasionally they will raid settlements for... prey.

Texts.Chs: 当你遭遇野蛮的企鹅掠夺者时，该怎么办的标准命令。
Texts.Eng: Standing orders regarding what to do should you encounter savage Peglaci Ravagers.

Texts.Chs: 甚至有报道说，他们中的一些已经经历了某种...二次蜕变。 据说它们比普通的企鹅更快，更强壮，更聪明。 接近时要格外小心，或者全副武装。
Texts.Eng: There have even been reports that some of them have undergone some sort of... secondary metamorphosis. They're said to be faster, stronger and smarter than the average Peglaci. Approach with extreme caution - or when heavily armed.
